Items.desc: Non-magic attack become %mod% higher when self's HP is below 25%

Items.desc: Make enemy target self

Items.name: Defense
Items.desc: Make defense in this round. Defense power increase to %mod% until next round

Items.name: Healing Defense
Items.desc: Defense Power increase to %mod% until next round, also recover HP for 10%

Items.name: Reflective Defense
Items.desc: Defense Power increase to %mod% until next round, If being hitted during defense, 25% damage is deal back to the attacker

Items.name: Heal
Items.desc: Heal target

Items.name: Potentiality
Items.desc: If user received a large enough damage that cause HP drop to 0, retain to 1 HP instead. This effect only happen if user's HP is higher then 50%

Items.name: Fireball
Items.desc: Cast a common fireball, deals %mod% damage

Items.desc: Deal %mod% damage. Also have a slight chance to decrease enemy AGI

Items.name: Thunder
Items.desc: Cast two lightings, each cause %mod% damage

Items.name: Tangle

Items.name: Explosion

Items.name: Magical Shield
Items.desc: Summon a magical shield to protect caster. Increase self's DEF and MDEF for %mod% for 10 rounds

Items.desc: Decrease MP usage of all skill by %mod%

Items.name: Beserk Assault
Items.desc: Attack all enemy fiecely, While in beserke mode this attack deals an extra 200% damage

Items.name: Berserking
Items.desc: Enter Berserk mode for 5 round, Increase all attack skill damage by 150% but reduce defense by 50%, Beserk Assault will cause an extra 200% damage on top of that.

Items.name: Last Hope
Items.desc: Recover HP to full and Increase Defense and Magic Defense greatly for 5 rounds

Items.name: God's Wrath
Items.desc: Create a thunder storm to strike all enemies twice, Has a small chance to stun enemy

Items.name: Mana Brust
Items.desc: Enter Mana Brust mode for 5 rounds. In this period, every magic attack deals 200% damage and use 150% MP. Metorite and Enternal Frost deals an extra 200% on top of that

Items.name: Metorite
Items.desc: Drop huge metorite from skies to elimate all enemy on the map.

Items.name: Eternal Frozen
Items.desc: Cast huge ice storm to froze all enemies in the map.

Items.name: Mana Recovery
Items.desc: Recover Mana Constantly in 5 rounds

Items.name: Holy Smite
Items.desc: Attack enemy with blinding light

Items.desc: Heal more than usual healing skill

Items.name: Expell Debuff
Items.desc: Remove all debuff from one party member

Items.name: Healing Aura
Items.desc: Heal all party members

Items.name: Summon Zombie
Items.desc: Summon a zombie to protect the caster for 10 rounds. Zombie will reduce incoming damage for 50%. Only 1 summon can exist at the same time

Items.name: Summon Skeleton Warrior
Items.desc: Summon a skeleton warrior to fight with the caster for 10 rounds. Your skeleton warrior will attack when you use attack skills. Only 1 summon can exist at the same time

Items.name: Summon Dark Spirit
Items.desc: Summon a dark spirit to fight with the caster. Dark Spirit will enchance your debuff chance by 2x. Only 1 summon can exist at the same time

Items.name: Sacrifice Summon
Items.desc: Sacrifice your Summon to explode on all enemies, creating a big damage

Items.name: Thunder Arrow
Items.desc: Shot a thunder-infused arrow, chance to stun enemy

Items.name: Wind Song
Items.desc: Recieve blessing of wind, reset all current cooldown to zero

Items.name: Triple Frozen Attack
Items.desc: Deal three quick frozen attacks on the enemy, chance to decrease enemy speed

Items.name: Smoke Bomb
Items.desc: Drop a smoke bomb and greatly affect the slight of all enemies

Items.name: Poisonous Bomb
Items.desc: Drop a poisonous bomb to posion all enemies

Items.name: Shadow Form
Items.desc: Enter Shadow Form, greatly increase self's AGI and DEX for 5 rounds, remove all current skill cooldown and increase damage of Shadow Assult by 200%

Items.name: Shadow Assault
Items.desc: Perform assault on all enemies.
